sentences.english: Oral English will be a new, welcome you to write articles or book reports.
sentences.chinese: 英語牆報將出新版，歡迎大家寫文章或讀書報告。

sentences.english: My classmates want me to work for the wall-newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我的同學想讓我做牆報工作。

sentences.english: My classmates want me to work for the wall newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我班同學要我擔任牆報工作。
